articles.author: Christina Wilkie
articles.title: Biden announces a new program to help Ukrainian refugees enter the U.S. - CNBC
articles.description: A dedicated web portal where Americans can apply to sponsor Ukrainians refugees will launch on Monday.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON President Joe Biden announced a new program Thursday that will expedite the U.S. asylum process for Ukrainian refugees fleeing Russia's invasion.
The "Unite for Ukraine" program will allo… [+2447 chars]
